body_html: This is odd. The first process (rank 0) exits with code 0 (success) and the other two (ranks 1 and 2) exit with code 1 (presumably caused by the broken pipe error). BUT, there is a barrier call in TestDistBackend._run prior to exiting. Only explanation for this error so far is that the first process is falling through the barrier without actually waiting on the other processes to reach it.

body: This is odd. The first process (rank 0) exits with code 0 (success) and the other two (ranks 1 and 2) exit with code 1 (presumably caused by the broken pipe error). BUT, there is a barrier call in `TestDistBackend._run` prior to exiting. Only explanation for this error so far is that the first process is falling through the barrier without actually waiting on the other processes to reach it.
